text: Dejan Dabović (3 August 1944 - 6 December 2020) was a Yugoslav water polo player. He was known for winning a gold medal in Mexico City in 1968, with the Yugoslavian water polo team. He was born in Herceg Novi. Dabović died on 6 December 2020 in Belgrade at the age of 76.Preminuo zlatni olimpijac iz Meksika 1968. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Yugoslavian water polo players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia
title: Dejan Dabović
